workflowstate.name: Entry - Send Initial Email To Ops Team

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


You have a new sales order request to approve.

Sales Order Number : {tranid}
Customer : {entity}


Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {statusref.id}='pendingApproval' and {custbody_bbs_ulh_project_manager.id} is null and {user.id} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Sales Order to Approve

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Entry Workflow State Field
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next Approver (2)

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


You have a new sales order request to approve.

Sales Order Number : {tranid}
Customer : {entity}


Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.subject: Sales Order Approval

lockrecordaction.conditionformula: ({userrole.id}!=3 or ({userrole.id} is null)) and ({nextapprover.id}!={me} or ({nextapprover.id} is null and {me} is not null) or ({nextapprover.id} is not null and {me} is null))

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.help: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next approver (2)

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


Congratulations, your sales order has been approved.


Sales Order Number : {tranid}
Customer : {entity}


Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {user.email} is not null and {custbody_bbs_ulh_created_by.email} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Sales Order Approval

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


Unfortunately, your sales order has been rejected.


Sales Order Number : {tranid}
Customer : {entity}

Additional rejection information:
{custbody7}


Please amend and resubmit or delete as appropriate


Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.subject: Sales Order Rejection
